title: FS- T206's (4/13 Update- Take 25% Off Everything)

posts.post_title: FS- T206's (4/13 Update- Take 25% Off Everything)
posts.post_content:
Have the T206's below for sale (link to pictures at the bottom). To try to cut down on trips to the post office due to COVID-19, I will be trying to just make trips on Thursdays and Mondays but will make exceptions if needed. Anyone who buys in the thread at listed prices will get the cards over any negotiations. Please contact me with any questions. Thanks!
